channel.title: Researches on TongZheng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on TongZheng's Blog

item.description: Narrative and Space: Reconstruction of South China Historical Trail Heritage Network 叙事与空间 ——南粤古驿道遗产网络构建研究 ABSTRACT Nanyue Ancient Path is the communication route between Lingnan and foreign regions, and has existed across periods throughout history. It is also known as the population migration corridor, the commodity exchange route and an ancient path making possible cultural exchange between civilizations. Considering the limitations in previous studies in this research area and ignoring narration, the current study introduces the narrative-space structural analytical method and views the Nanyue Ancient Path as a narrative that can be used to reveal its cultural connotations and characteristics.
